statements: SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM wrestling_venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM wrestling_venues WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, capacity FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity > 10000;
SELECT venue_name, past_events FROM wrestling_venues ORDER BY venue_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_name DESC
SELECT venue_name, location FROM wrestling_venues WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT venue_name, capacity, location FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity < 1000 AND location LIKE 'Los%'
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(past_events) AS events_count FROM wrestling_venues GROUP BY venue_name HAVING events_count > 10 ORDER BY events_count DESC
SELECT venue_name, capacity, location FROM venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, venue_name, date FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id;
SELECT event_name, venue_name, location FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT venue_name, capacity, location FROM venues;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, event_name, date FROM venues JOIN events ON venues.venue_id = events.venue_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, venue_name, date FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM WrestlingVenues;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM WrestlingVenues WHERE capacity > 10000;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age, wrestler_weight FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age < 30 ORDER BY wrestler_weight ASC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM WrestlingVenues WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM WrestlingVenues ORDER BY venue_id DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_weight > 200;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM Events JOIN WrestlingVenues ON Events.venue_id = WrestlingVenues.venue_id;
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM Events JOIN WrestlingVenues ON Events.venue_id = WrestlingVenues.venue_id GROUP BY venue_name ORDER BY num_events DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age, wrestler_weight FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age BETWEEN 25 AND 30 ORDER BY wrestler_weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_gender='male';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity > 10000;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_type FROM wrestlers INNER JOIN matches ON wrestlers.wrestler_id = matches.winning_wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_name ASC
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY wrestler_name DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT match_type, winning_wrestler_id, losing_wrestler_id FROM matches WHERE winning_wrestler_id IS NOT NULL AND losing_wrestler_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY match_type ASC
SELECT venue_name, capacity, location FROM wrestling_venues JOIN events ON wrestling_venues.venue_id = events.venue_id ORDER BY venue_name ASC, capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM wrestling_venues WHERE venue_capacity > 5000;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight FROM wrestling_wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_weight DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM wrestling_events JOIN wrestling_venues ON wrestling_events.venue_id = wrestling_venues.venue_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, championship_name FROM wrestling_wrestlers JOIN championships ON wrestling_wrestlers.wrestler_id = championships.wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_venues WHERE venue_capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight FROM wrestling_wrestlers WHERE wrestler_weight >= 200 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;

SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM wrestling_events JOIN wrestling_venues ON wrestling_events.venue_id = wrestling_venues.venue_id WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT wrestler_name, championship_name FROM wrestling_wrestlers JOIN championships ON wrestling_wrestlers.wrestler_id = championships.wrestler_id WHERE wrestler_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;

SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight, event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_wrestlers JOIN wrestler_events ON wrestling_wrestlers.wrestler_id = wrestler_events.wrestler_id JOIN wrestling_events ON wrestler_events.event_id = wrestling_events.event_id WHERE wrestler_weight BETWEEN 180 AND 220 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
